code: import{createSelector}from'reselect';var selectorCart=function selectorCart(state){return state.cart;};export var selectorCartItem=createSelector([selectorCart],function(cart){return cart.cartItems;});export var selectorHidden=createSelector([selectorCart],function(cart){return cart.hidden;});export var selectorTotal=createSelector([selectorCartItem],function(cartItems){return cartItems.reduce(function(accumulator,cartItem){return accumulator+cartItem.quantity*cartItem.price;},0);});export var selectorCartItemCount=createSelector([selectorCartItem],function(cartItems){return cartItems.reduce(function(accumulator,cartItem){return accumulator+cartItem.quantity;},0);});
